amendment.description: An amendment numbered 49 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to decrease the salary of Department's Acting Chief Diversity and Inclusion Officer Constance Mayor to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 241 (Roll no. 480).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 241 (Roll no. 480).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
